Package ORG.oclc.oai.server.verb

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BadVerb
    This class represents an BadVerb response on either the server or on the client
    GetRecord
    This class represents a GetRecord response on either the server or the client.
    Identify
    This class represents an Identify response on either the server or on the client
    ListIdentifiers
    This class represents a ListIdentifiers verb on either the server or on the client side.
    ListMetadataFormats
    This class represents a ListMetadataFormats verb on either the client or on the server.
    ListRecords
    Represents an OAI ListRecords Verb response.
    ListSets
    A ListSets OAI verb representation.
    ServerVerb
    ServerVerb is the parent class for each of the server-side OAI verbs.
